Articles.Content:
i can't find how to get the reactors from KSP interstellar. I have one but it is not the full version. it is just some life support or something. Where do I get the Intersetellar mod with reactors for .9?

Edited January 6, 2015 by Arugela

Interstellar Life support mod is different from KSP Interstellar.

Below is the link to the current incarnation of the mod you are looking for:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104943-0-90-KSP-Interstellar-port-maintance-thread

Also, as a user of KSPI myself... You don't get the reactors untill verry far down the tech tree. You get the first set of reactors at "Nuclear Fission" wich is way at the end of the default tech tree and costs 1000 science to unlock I believe.
Yep, that was it. Thank you very much!
